item.description:
Please join us for our regular monthly meetup and discussion on guerrilla gardening and seed balls!

We all know of a piece of Earth that has been damaged or neglected. We'll talk about one approach to healing these scars on our great mother...guerrilla gardening and seed balls!

The loose agenda:
7:00 PM- meet and greet
7:15 PM- share a potluck meal and talk about appropriate plants and places for them
8:00PM- make some seed balls!
9:00- wrap up

Please:
-Bring a potluck dish to share with the group
-Suggestions on locations for replanting the future
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be the gal who opens the door
item.name: Monthly Meetup and Potluck
